channel.title: publications on OpenDriveLab
channel.description: Recent content in publications on OpenDriveLab

item.title: PersFormer: 3D Lane Detection via Perspective Transformer and the OpenLane Benchmark.
item.description: Methods for 3D lane detection have been recently proposedto address the issue of inaccurate lane layouts in many autonomous driv-ing scenarios (uphill/downhill, bump,etc.
